description: Tomas Brand sure looks like he’s enjoying Michael Lachlan’s pecks -- I’ve never seen him so sensually manhandle someone before. This could be Michael’s best performance, and if you’re in disbelief check out 35:00 -- the action says it all.
title: Tomas Brand Breeds Michael Lachlan
